## Matrix.Reverse method

Calcule la matrice inverse.

```csharp
public Matrix Reverse()
```

### Return_Value

Matrice inverse.

### Exemples

```csharp
Matrix m = Matrix.Rotation(Math.PI / 2);
Matrix m1 = m.Reverse();
```
